item.title: New Empire minis arrived!
item.description: First post! For now I am planning to mostly use this blog/web-site to keep track of my miniature collection. Over years I’ve collected hundreds of miniatures and I’ve started to slowly loose track of what I actually have. So let’s start with a new addition to my collection…
